noise-level.name: NO_NOISE
noise-level.summary: Adds no noise at all. Only use this for non-sensitive fields, and only for metrics from UMA opt-in users.

noise-level.name: NORMAL_NOISE
noise-level.summary: The most common amount of noise, suitable for most fields.

noise-level.name: SPARSE_NOISE
noise-level.summary: Reduced noise, suitable for metrics which receive limited reports (less than 500,000 per day) or expect a highly skewed/sparse distribution over a wide set of domains. Approval from the Chrome Privacy and Rappor teams is required to implement a metric using this noise level.

rappor-parameters.name: COARSE_RAPPOR_TYPE
rappor-parameters.summary: Stricter parameters for metrics collected from a broader population.

rappor-parameters.name: ETLD_PLUS_ONE
rappor-parameters.summary: Deprecated parameters for collecting the domain and registry of a URL from UMA opt-in users. Should use UMA_RAPPOR_TYPE instead.

rappor-parameters.name: LOW_FREQUENCY_ETLD_PLUS_ONE
rappor-parameters.summary: Parameters for collecting the domain and registry of a URL from UMA opt-in users, using SPARSE_NOISE. Intended for sparse/skewed metrics, or low frequency metrics (less than 500,000 reports per day). Explicit approval from the Chrome Privacy and Rappor teams is required to use this type. New metrics should also consider LOW_FREQUENCY_UMA_RAPPOR_TYPE instead.

rappor-parameters.name: LOW_FREQUENCY_SAFEBROWSING_RAPPOR_TYPE
rappor-parameters.summary: Parameters for metrics related to Safe Browsing, collected from all users with safe browsing enabled, using SPARSE_NOISE. Intended for sparse/skewed metrics, or low frequency metrics (less than 500,000 reports per day). Explicit approval from the Chrome Privacy and Rappor teams is required to use this type.

rappor-parameters.name: LOW_FREQUENCY_UMA_RAPPOR_TYPE
rappor-parameters.summary: Parameters suitable for metrics from UMA opt-in users, using SPARSE_NOISE. Intended for sparse/skewed metrics, or low frequency metrics (less than 500,000 reports per day). Explicit approval from the Chrome Privacy and Rappor teams is required to use this type.

rappor-parameters.name: SAFEBROWSING_RAPPOR_TYPE
rappor-parameters.summary: Parameters for metrics related to Safe Browsing, collected from all users with safe browsing enabled.

rappor-parameters.name: UMA_RAPPOR_TYPE
rappor-parameters.summary: Parameters suitable for metrics from UMA opt-in users.

rappor-metric.name: Android.ExternalNavigationNotChosen
rappor-metric.summary: The package name of an application that was given as an alternative choice to handling a URL in Chrome, but wasn't chosen.

rappor-metric.name: Android.PageLoadDueToExternalApp
rappor-metric.summary: The package name of an application that sent an intent to Chrome. The name is taken from EXTRA_APPLICATION_ID passed to Chrome in the intent by the application.

rappor-metric.name: AppBanner.NativeApp.Dismissed
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that displayed a native app banner, which was explicitly dismissed by the user.

rappor-metric.name: AppBanner.NativeApp.Installed
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that displayed a native app banner, which resulted in the user installing the promoted application.

rappor-metric.name: AppBanner.NativeApp.Shown
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that displayed a native app banner.

rappor-metric.name: AppBanner.WebApp.Dismissed
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that displayed a web app banner, which was explicitly dismissed by the user.

rappor-metric.name: AppBanner.WebApp.Installed
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that displayed a web app banner, which resulted in the user installing the promoted application.

rappor-metric.name: AppBanner.WebApp.Shown
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that displayed a web app banner.

rappor-metric.name: Autofill.CardUploadNotOfferedConflictingNames
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL for which there was an attempted upload of a credit card but for which we found conflicting names between the address and the card.

rappor-metric.name: Autofill.CardUploadNotOfferedNoAddress
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL for which there was an attempted upload of a credit card but for which we couldn't find a recently used address to associate with it.

rappor-metric.name: Autofill.CardUploadNotOfferedNoCvc
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL for which there was an attempted upload of a credit card but the form data didn't contain the card CVC.

rappor-metric.name: Autofill.CardUploadNotOfferedNoName
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL for which there was an attempted upload of a credit card but for which we found no name associated with the address or the card.

rappor-metric.name: Autofill.HighNumberOfHeuristicMismatches
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL for which there was a high number of mismatches for the heuristic prediction of the form field types.

rappor-metric.name: Autofill.HighNumberOfServerMismatches
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL for which there was a high number of mismatches for the server prediction of the form field types.

rappor-metric.name: Autofill.QueryResponseHasNoServerDataForForm
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL for which there was a server query response for which the server had no data at all for at least one form.

rappor-metric.name: BackgroundSync.Register.Origin
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL which registered a Background Sync event.

rappor-metric.name: Cast.Sender.MediaFrameUrl
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the frame URL that the user is trying to cast the media from. Recorded every time the user casts the media.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.MixedScript.DisplayedShield
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that displayed a mixed script shield. Note: this does *not* include pages with mixed scripts where the user has already clicked through the shield.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.MixedScript.RanMixedScript
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that when mixed script actually ran.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.MixedScript.UserClickedAllow
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL where the user clicked "Load unsafe scripts" on a mixed content shield. (This results in a page refresh. Mixed scripts may not actually run until the users triggers them again after the refresh.)

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Denied.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Denied.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a AudioCapture permission prompt was Denied.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Denied.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which an AudioCapture permission prompt was Denied.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Dismissed.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Dismissed.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which an AudioCapture permission prompt was Dismissed.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Dismissed.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which an AudioCapture permission prompt was Dismissed.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Granted.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Granted.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which an AudioCapture permission prompt was accepted.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Granted.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which an AudioCapture permission prompt was accepted.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Ignored.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Ignored.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which an AudioCapture permission prompt was Ignored.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Ignored.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which an AudioCapture permission prompt was Ignored.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Revoked.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Revoked.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which an AudioCapture permission was revoked. Note: This metric is recorded for more revocation actions as of 2016-04-01 (M51).

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Revoked.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which an AudioCapture permission was revoked.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Camera.Revoked.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Renamed to ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Revoked.Url on 2016-01-07.** The domain for which a camera permission was revoked.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Denied.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Denied.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a Geolocation permission prompt was Denied.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Denied.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which a Geolocation permission prompt was Denied.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Dismissed.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Dismissed.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a Geolocation permission prompt was Dismissed.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Dismissed.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which a Geolocation permission prompt was Dismissed.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Granted.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Granted.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a Geolocation permission prompt was accepted.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Granted.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which a Geolocation permission prompt was accepted.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Ignored.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Ignored.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a Geolocation permission prompt was Ignored.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Ignored.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which a Geolocation permission prompt was Ignored.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Revoked.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Revoked.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a Geolocation permission was revoked. Note: This metric is recorded for more revocation actions as of 2016-04-01 (M51).

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Geolocation.Revoked.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which a Geolocation permission was revoked.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Mic.Revoked.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Renamed to ContentSettings.PermissionActions_AudioCapture.Revoked.Url on 2016-01-07.** The domain for which a microphone permission was revoked.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Denied.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Denied.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a Notification permission prompt was Denied.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Denied.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which a Notification permission prompt was Denied.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Dismissed.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Dismissed.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a Notification permission prompt was Dismissed.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Dismissed.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which a Notification permission prompt was Dismissed.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Granted.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Granted.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a Notification permission prompt was accepted.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Granted.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which a Notification permission prompt was accepted.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Ignored.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Ignored.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a Notification permission prompt was Ignored.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Ignored.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which a Notification permission prompt was Ignored.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Revoked.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Revoked.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a Notification permission was revoked. Note: This metric is recorded for more revocation actions as of 2016-04-01 (M51).

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_Notifications.Revoked.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which a Notification permission was revoked.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Denied.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Denied.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a VideoCapture permission prompt was Denied.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Denied.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which a VideoCapture permission prompt was Denied.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Dismissed.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Dismissed.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a VideoCapture permission prompt was Dismissed.

rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which a VideoCapture permission prompt was Dismissed.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Granted.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Granted.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a VideoCapture permission prompt was accepted.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Granted.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which a VideoCapture permission prompt was accepted.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Ignored.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Ignored.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which a VideoCapture permission prompt was Ignored.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Ignored.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which a VideoCapture permission prompt was Ignored.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Revoked.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. Replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Revoked.Url2 as of M52. The domain for which an VideoCapture permission was revoked. Note: This metric is recorded for more revocation actions as of 2016-04-01 (M51).

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionActions_VideoCapture.Revoked.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain for which an VideoCapture permission was revoked.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionRequested.Geolocation.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED: replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionRequested.Geolocation.Url2 as of M52. The domain that issues a Geolocation permission prompt.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionRequested.Geolocation.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain that issues a Geolocation permission prompt.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionRequested.Midi.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED: replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionRequested.Midi.Url2 as of M53. The domain that requests using MIDI devices.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionRequested.Midi.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain that requests using MIDI devices.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionRequested.Notifications.Url
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED: replaced by ContentSettings.PermissionRequested.Notifications.Url2 as of M52. The domain that issues a Notification permission prompt.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.PermissionRequested.Notifications.Url2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain that issues a Notification permission prompt.

rappor-metric.name: ContentSettings.Plugins.AddedAllowException
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that the user added to the ALLOW site exceptions for the Plugins Content Setting.

rappor-metric.name: CustomTabs.ServiceClient.PackageName
rappor-metric.summary: The package name for a client that has connected through the custom tabs service.

rappor-metric.name: DeviceSensors.DeviceMotion
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that is using Device Motion API.

rappor-metric.name: DeviceSensors.DeviceOrientation
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that is using Device Orientation API.

rappor-metric.name: DomDistiller.OpenPanel
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of the frame URL where Reader Mode panel is opened by the user.

rappor-metric.name: DomDistiller.PromptPanel
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of the frame URL where Reader Mode is prompted.

rappor-metric.name: Extensions.AffectedByIsolateExtensions
rappor-metric.summary: The ID of an extension which will trigger out-of-process iframes under --isolate-extensions. This metric is logged even if --isolate-extensions is disabled. Includes framing in both directions: non-extension documents that contain chrome-extension:// iframes, or vice versa. Hosted apps are not considered extensions for the purposes of this metric.

rappor-metric.name: Extensions.PossibleAdInjection2
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that might be doing ad injection.

rappor-metric.name: Launch.HomeScreen.Shortcut
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that was launched from the Android Home screen into a tab. This explicitly does not count relaunches via the Android Recents menu.

rappor-metric.name: Launch.HomeScreen.Standalone
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that was launched from the Android Home screen into a WebappActivity. This explicitly does not count relaunches via the Android Recents menu.

rappor-metric.name: Launch.HomeScreenSource.AddToHomeScreen
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that was launched from the Android Home screen via an intent added from an add to homescreen menu item. This explicitly does not count relaunches via the Android Recents menu.

rappor-metric.name: Launch.HomeScreenSource.AppBanner
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that was launched from the Android Home screen via an intent added from an app banner. This explicitly does not count relaunches via the Android Recents menu.

rappor-metric.name: Launch.HomeScreenSource.BookmarkNavigatorWidget
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that was launched from the Chrome's bookmark navigator widget. This explicitly does not count relaunches via the Android Recents menu.

rappor-metric.name: Launch.HomeScreenSource.BookmarkShortcutWidget
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that was launched from the Chrome's bookmark shortcut widget. This explicitly does not count relaunches via the Android Recents menu.

rappor-metric.name: Launch.HomeScreenSource.Unknown
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that was launched from the Android Home screen via an intent added from an unknown source. This explicitly does not count relaunches via the Android Recents menu.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.EME
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that uses Encrypted Media Extensions (EME).

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.EME.Insecure
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that uses Encrypted Media Extensions (EME) from an insecure origin.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.GpuVideoDecoderInitFailure
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player but seeing a failure when trying to initialize the GpuVideoDecoder.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.HLS
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player to play a HLS stream.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.MS
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player using MediaStream.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.MSE
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player using Media Source Extensions (MSE).

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.MSE.Insecure
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player using Media Source Extensions (MSE) from an insecure origin.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.MSE.PipelineError
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player using Media Source Extensions (MSE) and ends up with an error.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.MSE.Secure
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player using Media Source Extensions (MSE) from a potentially trustworthy origin.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.MSE.VideoCodec.h264
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player using MSE with H264 video codec.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.MSE.VideoCodec.vp8
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player using MSE with VP8 video codec.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.MSE.VideoCodec.vp9
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player using MSE with VP9 video codec.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.SRC
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player using SRC.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.SRC.PipelineError
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player using SRC and ends up with an error.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.SRC.VideoCodec.h264
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player using SRC with H264 video codec.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.SRC.VideoCodec.vp8
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player using SRC with VP8 video codec.

rappor-metric.name: Media.OriginUrl.SRC.VideoCodec.vp9
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that loads an HTML5 media player using SRC with VP9 video codec.

rappor-metric.name: NTP.ExplicitUserAction.PageNavigation.NTPTileClick
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of the website visited by a user by clicking on the tile in the NewTabPage.

rappor-metric.name: NTP.ExplicitUserAction.PageNavigation.OmniboxNonSearch
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of the website visited by a user by typing the URL in the omnibox including those completed from suggestions but not including those that end up being searches in the search engine.

rappor-metric.name: Navigation.Scheme.Data
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that resulted in a main frame navigation to a |data:| URL. This includes page initiated navigations (e.g. redirects) and users clicking links, but excludes navigations initiated by users typing |data:| URLs.

rappor-metric.name: Net.ErrAborted.Fast
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that leads to a main frame ERR_ABORTED error less than 100 ms after the request is created.

rappor-metric.name: Net.ErrAborted.Slow
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL that leads to a main frame ERR_ABORTED error more than 100 ms after the request is created.

rappor-metric.name: PageLoad.CoarseTiming.NavigationToFirstContentfulPaint
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of the website visited, along with a bitfield representing bucket membership in a coarse histogram of time from navigation start to the time the first real content (text/image) is painted on the screen (See PageLoad.PaintTiming.NavigationToFirstContentfulPaint). The bucket's name is the histogram's lower bound. Tracks the same sites that the rest of the PageLoad.* histogram metrics track, i.e. http/s, html, main frame navigations. Metrics are only recorded for navigations that reached first contentful paint entirely in the foreground.

string-field.name: Domain
string-field.summary: The domain+registry of the URL.

flags-field.name: Bucket
flags-field.summary: Bitfield representing the bucket when the time to first contentful paint occurred.

flags-field.name: IsSlow
flags-field.summary: Whether or not the navigation to first contentful paint took over ten seconds. We send this over to ease in analysis. The Bucket field has many dimensions of noise (i.e. bits flipped), so it will be much harder to de-noise than this one.

rappor-metric.name: Permissions.Action.AudioCapture
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. No longer reported as of M52. The domain+registry of a URL that requested the MediaStream Microphone API.

string-field.name: Scheme
string-field.summary: The scheme of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Host
string-field.summary: The host of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Port
string-field.summary: The port of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Domain
string-field.summary: The domain+registry of a URL that requested a permission.

flags-field.name: Actions
flags-field.summary: Bitfield of the permission actions taken for this permission.

rappor-metric.name: Permissions.Action.DurableStorage
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. No longer reported as of M52. The domain+registry of a URL that requested the Durable Storage API.

string-field.name: Scheme
string-field.summary: The scheme of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Host
string-field.summary: The host of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Port
string-field.summary: The port of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Domain
string-field.summary: The domain+registry of a URL that requested a permission.

flags-field.name: Actions
flags-field.summary: Bitfield of the permission actions taken for this permission.

rappor-metric.name: Permissions.Action.Geolocation
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. No longer reported as of M52. The domain+registry of a URL that requested the Geolocation API.

string-field.name: Scheme
string-field.summary: The scheme of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Host
string-field.summary: The host of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Port
string-field.summary: The port of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Domain
string-field.summary: The domain+registry of a URL that requested a permission.

flags-field.name: Actions
flags-field.summary: Bitfield of the permission actions taken for this permission.

rappor-metric.name: Permissions.Action.MidiSysEx
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. No longer reported as of M52. The domain+registry of a URL that requested the MidiSysEx API.

string-field.name: Scheme
string-field.summary: The scheme of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Host
string-field.summary: The host of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Port
string-field.summary: The port of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Domain
string-field.summary: The domain+registry of a URL that requested a permission.

flags-field.name: Actions
flags-field.summary: Bitfield of the permission actions taken for this permission.

rappor-metric.name: Permissions.Action.Notifications
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. No longer reported as of M52. The domain+registry of a URL that requested the Notifications API.

string-field.name: Scheme
string-field.summary: The scheme of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Host
string-field.summary: The host of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Port
string-field.summary: The port of a URL that requested a permission.

string-field.name: Domain
string-field.summary: The domain+registry of a URL that requested a permission.

flags-field.name: Actions
flags-field.summary: Bitfield of the permission actions taken for this permission.

rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. No longer reported as of M52. The domain+registry of a URL that requested the ProtectedMediaIdentifier API.

rappor-metric.name: Plugins.FlashOriginUrl
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the top level URL of a page which attempts to launch a Flash NPAPI or PPAPI plugin, if the client has Flash installed and enabled. Recorded when the plugin frame appears for each Flash object found on the page, even if the plugin is click-to-play.

rappor-metric.name: Plugins.FlashUrl
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL from where Flash SWF or SPL content is being loaded from, while attempting to launch a Flash (NPAPI or PPAPI) plugin that is installed and enabled. Recorded when the plugin frame appears for each Flash object found in the page, even if the plugin is click-to-play.

rappor-metric.name: Plugins.SilverlightOriginUrl
rappor-metric.summary: Deprecated with NPAPI removal. The domain and registry of the top level URL of a page which attempts to launch a Silverlight NPAPI plugin, if the client has Silverlight installed and enabled. Recorded when the plugin frame appears for each Silverlight object found on the page, even if the plugin is click-to-play.

rappor-metric.name: PowerfulFeatureUse.ETLDPlus1.GetUserMedia.Insecure
rappor-metric.summary: The ETLD+1 of the URL that uses the getUserMedia API from an insecure origin.

rappor-metric.name: PowerfulFeatureUse.ETLDPlus1.GetUserMedia.Secure
rappor-metric.summary: The ETLD+1 of the URL that uses the getUserMedia API from a secure origin.

rappor-metric.name: PowerfulFeatureUse.Host.ApplicationCacheAPI.Insecure
rappor-metric.summary: The host of the URL that uses a the Application Cache programmatic API from an insecure origin.

rappor-metric.name: PowerfulFeatureUse.Host.ApplicationCacheManifestSelect.Insecure
rappor-metric.summary: The host of the URL that uses an Application Cache manifest from an insecure origin.

rappor-metric.name: PowerfulFeatureUse.Host.DeviceMotion.Insecure
rappor-metric.summary: The host of the URL that uses the device motion API from an insecure origin.

rappor-metric.name: PowerfulFeatureUse.Host.DeviceOrientation.Insecure
rappor-metric.summary: The host of the URL that uses the device orientation API from an insecure origin.

rappor-metric.name: PowerfulFeatureUse.Host.Fullscreen.Insecure
rappor-metric.summary: The host of the URL that uses the fullscreen API from an insecure origin.

rappor-metric.name: PowerfulFeatureUse.Host.Geolocation.Insecure
rappor-metric.summary: The host of the URL that uses the geolocation API from an insecure origin.

rappor-metric.name: PowerfulFeatureUse.Host.GetUserMedia.Insecure
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. No longer reporting as of M53. Replaced by PowerfulFeatureUse.ETLDPlus1.GetUserMedia.Insecure The host of the URL that uses the getUserMedia API from an insecure origin.

rappor-metric.name: PowerfulFeatureUse.Host.GetUserMedia.Secure
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED. No longer reporting as of M53. Replaced by PowerfulFeatureUse.ETLDPlus1.GetUserMedia.Secure. The host of the URL that uses the getUserMedia API from a secure origin.

rappor-metric.name: PushMessaging.GenericNotificationShown.Origin
rappor-metric.summary: Number of times the generic (forced) notification was shown per origin. This happens if the site uses the push api but does not generate a notification of their own.

rappor-metric.name: PushMessaging.MessageReceived.Origin
rappor-metric.summary: Push Messages received per Origin.

rappor-metric.name: RTCPeerConnection.Audio
rappor-metric.summary: The ETLD+1 of the URL with a WebRTC peer connection with at least one audio track.

rappor-metric.name: RTCPeerConnection.DataChannel
rappor-metric.summary: The ETLD+1 of the URL with a WebRTC peer connection with at least one data channel.

rappor-metric.name: RTCPeerConnection.Video
rappor-metric.summary: The ETLD+1 of the URL with a WebRTC peer connection with at least one video track.

rappor-metric.name: ResourceReporter.Cpu
rappor-metric.summary: A Chrome task, its process priority, and its CPU usage range.

string-field.name: task
string-field.summary: The canonicalized name of a Chrome task. In most cases this is the origin URL of the task's WebContents.

flags-field.name: priority
flags-field.summary: Bitfield for the task's process priority (whether it's foregrounded or backgrounded).

flags-field.name: num_cores_range
flags-field.summary: Bitfield for the current system's number or cores range.

flags-field.name: usage_range
flags-field.summary: Bitfield for the tasks CPU usage range.

rappor-metric.name: ResourceReporter.Memory
rappor-metric.summary: A Chrome task, and its memory usage range.

string-field.name: task
string-field.summary: The canonicalized name of a Chrome task. In most cases this is the origin URL of the task's WebContents.

flags-field.name: priority
flags-field.summary: Bitfield for the task's process priority (whether it's foregrounded or backgrounded).

flags-field.name: usage_range
flags-field.summary: Bitfield for the tasks memory usage range.

rappor-metric.name: SafeBrowsing.UnverifiedDownloads.Allowed
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED: No longer reported as of M52. The domain and registry of the URL for which a download was allowed without being verified by Safe Browsing. Recorded before the download is started.

rappor-metric.name: SafeBrowsing.UnverifiedDownloads.AllowedByWhitelist
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED: No longer reported as of M52. The domain and registry of the URL for which a download was allowed without being verified by Safe Browsing because it was on a whitelisted domain. Recorded before the download is started. The candidates should come from the domain whitelist.

rappor-metric.name: SafeBrowsing.UnverifiedDownloads.AllowedDueToDisabledService
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED: No longer reported as of M52. The domain and registry of the URL for which a download was allowed without being verified by Safe Browsing because the service was disabled at the time. Recorded before the download is started.

rappor-metric.name: SafeBrowsing.UnverifiedDownloads.Blocked
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED: No longer reported as of M52. The domain and registry of the URL for which a download was blocked without being verified by Safe Browsing because the extension matched the blacklist provided by Finch. Recorded before the download is started.

rappor-metric.name: Search.DefaultSearchProvider
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL for the default search engine. Recorded when a profile is opened or after a profile reset.

rappor-metric.name: ServiceWorker.ControlledPageUrl
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL of the page which is controlled by a ServiceWorker. Recorded when the page is loaded.

rappor-metric.name: Settings.FirstStartupPage
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL of the first page opened on startup. Recorded when a profile is loaded if preferences specify a fixed set of URLs to open on startup.

rappor-metric.name: Settings.HomePage2
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of the prefs::kHomePage setting. Recorded when a profile is loaded if the URL is valid and prefs::kHomePageIsNewTabPage is false.

rappor-metric.name: Settings.NewTabPage
rappor-metric.summary: The domain and registry of the URL chrome://newtab is rewritten to. Recorded when a profile is loaded, if the URL is valid.

rappor-metric.name: SoftwareReporter.FoundUwS
rappor-metric.summary: The IDs of unwanted software found by the software reporter tool.

rappor-metric.name: Startup.BrowserLaunchURL
rappor-metric.summary: The eTLD+1 of a URL that was passed in from the command line when Chrome is invoked. Note that this handles the case of a URL passed to Chrome starting up, or when a running Chrome is given the message to open a new URL.

rappor-metric.name: WebComponents.DocumentRegisterElement
rappor-metric.summary: The host of a URL that used Document::RegisterElement().

rappor-metric.name: WebComponents.ElementCreateShadowRoot
rappor-metric.summary: The host of a URL that used Element::CreateShadowRoot().

rappor-metric.name: WebComponents.EventPath
rappor-metric.summary: The host of a URL that used Event::Path().

rappor-metric.name: WebComponents.EventPath.Extensions
rappor-metric.summary: The name of an extension that used Event::Path().

rappor-metric.name: interstitial.harmful
rappor-metric.summary: The domain+registry of a URL that triggered a safe-browsing UWS interstitial.

string-field.name: domain
string-field.summary: **DEPRECATED: replaced by interstitial.harmful2 as of M52. The domain+registry of a URL that triggered a safe-browsing UWS interstitial.

flags-field.name: flags
flags-field.summary: Bitfield of the state from a safe-browsing UWS warning interstitial.

rappor-metric.summary: The domain+registry of a URL that triggered a safe-browsing UWS interstitial.

flags-field.name: flags

rappor-metric.summary: The domain+registry of a URL that triggered a safe-browsing malware interstitial.

string-field.name: domain
string-field.summary: The domain+registry of a URL that triggered a safe-browsing phishing interstitial.

flags-field.name: flags

rappor-metric.name: interstitial.phishing2
rappor-metric.summary: The domain+registry of a URL that triggered a safe-browsing phishing interstitial.

string-field.name: domain
string-field.summary: The domain+registry of a URL that triggered a safe-browsing phishing interstitial.

flags-field.name: flags
flags-field.summary: Bitfield of the state from a safe-browsing phishing warning interstitial.

rappor-metric.name: interstitial.ssl.domain
rappor-metric.summary: ** DEPRECATED. Replaced by insterstitial.ssl2.domain on 2015-07-07 since the type changed.** The domain+registry of a URL that triggered an SSL interstitial. Domains for bad-clock warnings are not reported.

rappor-metric.name: interstitial.ssl2
rappor-metric.summary: **DEPRECATED: replaced by interstitial.ssl2 as of M52. The domain+registry of a URL that triggered an SSL interstitial.

string-field.name: domain
string-field.summary: The domain+registry of a URL that triggered an SSL interstitial.

flags-field.name: flags
flags-field.summary: Bitfield of the state from an SSL warning interstitial.

rappor-metric.name: interstitial.ssl3
rappor-metric.summary: The domain+registry of a URL that triggered an SSL interstitial.

string-field.name: domain
string-field.summary: The domain+registry of a URL that triggered an SSL interstitial.

flags-field.name: flags
flags-field.summary: Bitfield of the state from an SSL warning interstitial.
